mapper.select: SELECT ADMINSEQ, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITEDATE", BOARDTYPE, DELFLAG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ADMINSEQ DESC) AS "ROWNUM" FROM NOTIQUESTION n1 JOIN NAEMEMBER n2 ON n1.MEMBERSEQ = n2.MEMBERSEQ WHERE BOARDTYPE = 'G'

SELECT n1.ADMINSEQ, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITEDATE", BOARDTYPE, a.USERFILE, a.FILESIZE, DELFLAG FROM NOTIQUESTION n1 JOIN NAEMEMBER n2 ON n1.MEMBERSEQ = n2.MEMBERSEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHFILE a ON n1.ADMINSEQ = a.ADMINSEQ WHERE BOARDTYPE = 'G' AND n1.ADMINSEQ =#{adminseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIQUESTION (ADMINSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, DELFLAG, REFERENCE, BOARDTYPE, MEMBERSEQ) VALUES(ADMINSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', 0, 'G', 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTIQUESTION SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITEDATE=SYSDATE WHERE ADMINSEQ=#{adminseq}
UPDATE NOTIQUESTION SET DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE ADMINSEQ=#{adminseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHFILE (FILESEQ, USERFILE, SEARCHFILE, FILESIZE, UPLOADDATE, FILEPATH, ADMINSEQ, MEMBERSEQ) VALUES(FILESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userfile}, #{searchfile}, #{filesize}, SYSDATE, #{filepath}, ADMINSEQ.CURRVAL, #{memberseq})
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTACHFILE SET USERFILE=#{userfile}, SEARCHFILE=#{searchfile}, FILESIZE=#{filesize}, UPLOADDATE=SYSDATE, FILEPATH=#{filepath} WHERE ADMINSEQ=#{adminseq}
mapper.select: SELECT ADMINSEQ, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITEDATE", n2.MEMBERSEQ, BOARDTYPE, DELFLAG, REFERENCE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REFERENCE DESC, ADMINSEQ ASC) AS "ROWNUM" FROM NOTIQUESTION n1 JOIN NAEMEMBER n2 ON n1.MEMBERSEQ = n2.MEMBERSEQ WHERE BOARDTYPE = 'M' ORDER BY ADMINSEQ DESC

SELECT REFERENCE, ADMINSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITEDATE", MEMBERSEQ, BOARDTYPE, DELFLAG FROM NOTIQUESTION n1 JOIN (SELECT REFERENCE FROM NOTIQUESTION GROUP BY(REFERENCE)) n2 USING(REFERENCE) WHERE BOARDTYPE ='M' AND MEMBERSEQ =#{memberseq} ORDER BY REFERENCE DESC, ADMINSEQ ASC

SELECT n1.ADMINSEQ, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITEDATE", BOARDTYPE, DELFLAG FROM NOTIQUESTION n1 JOIN NAEMEMBER n2 ON n1.MEMBERSEQ = n2.MEMBERSEQ WHERE BOARDTYPE = 'M' AND n1.ADMINSEQ = #{adminseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIQUESTION (ADMINSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, DELFLAG, REFERENCE, BOARDTYPE, MEMBERSEQ) VALUES(ADMINSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', (SELECT NVL(MAX(REFERENCE),0)+1 FROM NOTIQUESTION), 'M', #{memberseq})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTIQUESTION SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITEDATE=SYSDATE WHERE ADMINSEQ=#{adminseq}
UPDATE NOTIQUESTION SET DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE ADMINSEQ=#{adminseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIQUESTION (ADMINSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, DELFLAG, REFERENCE, BOARDTYPE, MEMBERSEQ) VALUES(ADMINSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', (SELECT REFERENCE FROM NOTIQUESTION WHERE ADMINSEQ=#{adminseq}), 'M', #{memberseq})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTIQUESTION SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITEDATE=SYSDATE WHERE ADMINSEQ=#{adminseq}
